title: Best of The Herd for Feb 11, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Feb 11, 2020
description:
Colin doesn't care about Tua's injury history, hes the best QB available in the NFL Draft. He says the Patriots and Brady are stuck with each other even though the relationship has turned contentious. Colin's favorite guest ever Charlotte Flair of the WWE comes in studio and talks about the chaotic life of a professional wrestler. Plus, Fox Sports NBA Analyst Ric Bucher talks with Colin about the one player in the NBA who will dictate the next dynasty.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
